description: This file declares the DobbySpecGenerator class responsible for generating JSON specifications for container or runtime environments based on application and runtime configurations. It provides methods to create environment variables, mounts, plugins, and other configuration components for the container, indicating its role in orchestrating runtime specifications.
external_methods: Json::Value createEnvVars(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const
Json::Value createMounts(const ApplicationConfiguration&, const WPEFramework::Exchange::RuntimeConfig&) const

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating configuration specifications for runtime environments, particularly for containerized applications, based on provided application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main method to generate a JSON specification string based on application and runtime configurations.
